oai_dc:dc.dc:title: WAVE ATTENUATION AND SET-UP ON A BEACH
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Svendsen, I.A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: set up
wave attenuation
beach set up
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A theoretical two-dimensional model for wave heights and set-up in a surf zone is described and compared to measurements. The integral wave properties energy flux Ef, and radiation stress Sxx are determined from crude approximations of the actual flow in surf zone waves. Some physical aspects of the outer region are discussed and found to agree with our knowledge of the waves seawards and shorewards of this region.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 19 (1984): Proceedings of 19th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Houston, Texas, 1984.; 4
